## ðŸŒ¤ï¸ Weather Forecast

> Computed weather for each destination using formulas!

### San Francisco

```formula:sf_weather
=WEATHER("San Francisco, CA", "{startDate}")
```

### Day 2 Weather

```formula:day2_weather
=WEATHER("San Francisco, CA", =ADD_DAYS("{startDate}", 1))
```

## ðŸš— Routes & Distances

> Calculate routes between destinations!

### Day 1 Route

```formula:day1_route
=ROUTE("San Francisco International Airport", "The Hotel Nikko, San Francisco")
```

### Day 2 Distance

```formula:day2_total
=ADD(
  =DISTANCE("The Hotel Nikko", "Golden Gate Bridge"),
  =DISTANCE("Golden Gate Bridge", "Ghirardelli Square"),
  =DISTANCE("Ghirardelli Square", "Fisherman's Wharf")
)
```
